verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Adam \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wife \w Eve|strong="H2332"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* she \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*.\f + \fr 4:1 \ft Cain sounds like the Hebrew for acquired or brought forth.\f* “\w With|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* help \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w brought|strong="H3205"\w* \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3045"\w*,” she said.

\w Later|strong="H1961"\w* she \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*’s brother \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w*. \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w keeper|strong="H7462"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, \w while|strong="H1961"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w tiller|strong="H5647"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H5647"\w* soil.

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* course \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w some|strong="H7093"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* soil \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w an|strong="H1961"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*,

\w while|strong="H1931"\w* \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w* \w brought|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w best|strong="H2459"\w* \w portions|strong="H2459"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w firstborn|strong="H1062"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w looked|strong="H8159"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*,

\w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H8159"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w regard|strong="H8159"\w* \w for|strong="H6440"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*. \w So|strong="H3808"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w became|strong="H2734"\w* \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w angry|strong="H2734"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*?

If \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* what \w is|strong="H2403"\w* \w right|strong="H4910"\w*, \w will|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w accepted|strong="H3190"\w*? \w But|strong="H3808"\w* if \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w refuse|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w do|strong="H3190"\w* what \w is|strong="H2403"\w* \w right|strong="H4910"\w*, \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* \w is|strong="H2403"\w* \w crouching|strong="H7257"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w your|strong="H3190"\w* \w door|strong="H6607"\w*; \w it|strong="H3190"\w* desires \w you|strong="H3808"\w*,\f + \fr 4:7 \ft Or it desires to control you\f* \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w master|strong="H4910"\w* \w it|strong="H3190"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* brother \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w*, “\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w us|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H6965"\w* \w out|strong="H6965"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.” \f + \fr 4:8 \ft SP, LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate; Hebrew Then Cain spoke to his brother Abel.\f* \w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w while|strong="H1961"\w* they \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6965"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w against|strong="H6965"\w* \w his|strong="H6965"\w* brother \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H2026"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8104"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*, “\w Where|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brother \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w*?” “\w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w*!” \w he|strong="H3068"\w* answered. “\w Am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* brother’s \w keeper|strong="H8104"\w*?”

“\w What|strong="H4100"\w* have \w you|strong="H6213"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*?” replied \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w your|strong="H6213"\w* brother’s \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w cries|strong="H6963"\w* \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w Me|strong="H6963"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* ground.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w you|strong="H3947"\w* \w are|strong="H3027"\w* cursed \w and|strong="H3027"\w* banished \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* ground, \w which|strong="H1818"\w* \w has|strong="H3027"\w* \w opened|strong="H6475"\w* \w its|strong="H6475"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w receive|strong="H3947"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* brother’s \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w your|strong="H3947"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w till|strong="H5647"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* ground, \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3254"\w* \w yield|strong="H5414"\w* \w its|strong="H5414"\w* \w produce|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fugitive|strong="H5128"\w* \w and|strong="H3254"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wanderer|strong="H5110"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* earth.”

\w But|strong="H3068"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* said \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5375"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w My|strong="H3068"\w* \w punishment|strong="H5771"\w* \f + \fr 4:13 \ft Or guilt or sin\f* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w greater|strong="H1419"\w* \w than|strong="H1419"\w* \w I|strong="H3068"\w* can \w bear|strong="H5375"\w*.

\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w this|strong="H6440"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w driven|strong="H1644"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5641"\w*; \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w fugitive|strong="H5128"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wanderer|strong="H5110"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w whoever|strong="H3605"\w* \w finds|strong="H4672"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*.”

“\w Not|strong="H1115"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*!”\f + \fr 4:15 \ft LXX, Vulgate, and Syriac; Hebrew “Very well!” or “Therefore:”\f* replied \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. “\w If|strong="H3651"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w slays|strong="H2026"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*, \w then|strong="H3651"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w placed|strong="H7760"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mark|strong="H7760"\w* \w on|strong="H7760"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w no|strong="H1115"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H5221"\w*.

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w settled|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Nod|strong="H5113"\w*,\f + \fr 4:16 \ft Nod means wandering.\f* \w east|strong="H6926"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*. The Descendants of Cain

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Enoch|strong="H2585"\w*. \w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w built|strong="H1129"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Enoch|strong="H2585"\w*.

Now \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Enoch|strong="H2585"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w* \w Irad|strong="H5897"\w*, \w and|strong="H2585"\w* \w Irad|strong="H5897"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Mehujael|strong="H4232"\w*, \w and|strong="H2585"\w* \w Mehujael|strong="H4232"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Methusael|strong="H4967"\w*, \w and|strong="H2585"\w* \w Methusael|strong="H4967"\w* \w was|strong="H3205"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w*.

\w And|strong="H8147"\w* \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w* \w married|strong="H3947"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* women, \w one|strong="H8147"\w* \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Adah|strong="H5711"\w* \w and|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w other|strong="H8145"\w* \w Zillah|strong="H6741"\w*.

\w Adah|strong="H5711"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w Jabal|strong="H2989"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w father|strong="H3205"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w those|strong="H1931"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* tents \w and|strong="H3427"\w* raise \w livestock|strong="H4735"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3658"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* brother’s \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Jubal|strong="H3106"\w*; \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* father \w of|strong="H8034"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w play|strong="H8610"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* \w and|strong="H3658"\w* \w flute|strong="H5748"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5178"\w* \w Zillah|strong="H6741"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w Tubal-cain|strong="H8423"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w forger|strong="H3913"\w* \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* implement \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w and|strong="H5178"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*. \w And|strong="H5178"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sister \w of|strong="H3205"\w* \w Tubal-cain|strong="H8423"\w* \w was|strong="H1931"\w* \w Naamah|strong="H5279"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H8085"\w* \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w* \w said|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* wives: “\w Adah|strong="H5711"\w* \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w Zillah|strong="H6741"\w*, \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*; wives \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w*, \w listen|strong="H8085"\w* \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w my|strong="H8085"\w* speech. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3588"\w* \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H3206"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w wounding|strong="H6482"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w young|strong="H3206"\w* \w man|strong="H3206"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w striking|strong="H2250"\w* \w me|strong="H6963"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w is|strong="H3588"\w* \w avenged|strong="H5358"\w* \w sevenfold|strong="H7659"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lamech|strong="H3929"\w* \w seventy-sevenfold|strong="H7657"\w*.”\f + \fr 4:24 \ft Hebrew; LXX can be translated as either seventy times seven or seventy-sevenfold; see also Matthew 18:22.\f* Seth and Enosh

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Adam \w again|strong="H5750"\w* \w had|strong="H3205"\w* \w relations|strong="H3045"\w* \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* wife, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w gave|strong="H3205"\w* \w birth|strong="H3205"\w* \w to|strong="H3205"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w named|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* \w Seth|strong="H8352"\w*,\f + \fr 4:25 \ft Seth probably means granted or appointed.\f* saying, “God \w has|strong="H3588"\w* granted \w me|strong="H7121"\w* \w another|strong="H5750"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Abel|strong="H1893"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w Cain|strong="H7014"\w* \w killed|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w Seth|strong="H8352"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w born|strong="H3205"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H3205"\w* Enosh. \w At|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* time \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \f + \fr 4:26 \ft Or to proclaim; some translators to invoke or to call themselves by or to profane \f* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3205"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
